# Yippee!
rob isn't a broken tool anymore!<br>
The previous versions of rob were hard to install, pretty garbage, and kind-of hard to use. Now, rob is distributed using pip. Alternativly, you can download binaries for your OS (.exe for windows, executable shell file for linux, etc) Actual README starts below:

# rob - command line downloader tool
